events.text: You are finally here… Yes… just like what Charon had foretold!
Excuse me, may I know who you are?
Oh I am of no importance, my child! What matters is you are here! You will finally stop all the madness that is plaguing us all!
Then tell me what I should do! Me and Rian, we cannot stand this madness anymore!
A long time ago…people would perform rituals here to satisfy Charon, the demon god that the villagers had a pact to.
Charon himself whispered to me…on the last ritual, your ancestor ran away, and thus he cursed all the descendants of this village.

This village might have died, but the candles that should have been lit on that day still remain. Bring me 6 of the candles scattered throughout the village. Then I should tell you what you should do next.
